title: Trend80 Snowboarding 2/10: Ben Simmons, Clog, Freedom Convoy, Bob Saget, Billie Eilish, Super Bowl Ads
itunes:title: Trend80 Snowboarding 2/10: Ben Simmons, Clog, Freedom Convoy, Bob Saget, Billie Eilish, Super Bowl Ads
description:
In this edition of Trend80 Snowboarding, Jack and super producer Becca discuss the Ben Simmons trade, Trump clogging up the toilets at the White House, a Freedom Convoy update, Bob Saget's cause of death, Billie Eilish being a showstopper, and their favorite Super Bowl ads so far.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
